2015.question: Name the authors of the following books:
2015.prashna: निम्नलिखित पुस्तकों के लेखकों के नाम लिखें:

2016.question: Name the poets who wrote the following lines: (a) Yester night the Sunne went hence / And yet is here today / He hath no desire no sense / Nor halfe so short a way. (b) I celebrate myself and sing myself / An what I assume you shall assume, / For every atom belonging to me as good belongs to you. (c) Cold, impossible, ahead / Lifts the mountain's lovely head / Whose white waterfall could bless / Travellers in their last distress. (d) An where the water had dripped from the taps in a small clearness / He sipped with his straight mouth / Softly drank through his straight gums, / into his slack long body silently. (e) Here lies a most beautiful lady. / Light of step and heart was she, / I think she was the most beautiful lady / That every was in the West Country.
2016.prashna: उन कवियों के नाम बताइए जिन्होंने निम्नलिखित पंक्तियाँ लिखी हैं: (क) Yester night the Sunne went hence... (ख) I celebrate myself and sing myself... (ग) Cold, impossible, ahead... (घ) An where the water had dripped... (ङ) Here lies a most beautiful lady...

2020.question: Answer any five of the following in about 40-50 words:
2020.prashna: निम्नलिखित में से किन्हीं पाँच के उत्तर लगभग 40-50 शब्दों में दें:

sub_questions.a: Why did the poet feel honoured?
sub_questions.b: What conditions prevail in the woods?
sub_questions.c: What is civilization in the real sense of the term?
sub_questions.d: What are the 'trials and tribulations' Martin Luther King, Jr. talks about?
sub_questions.e: What is the impact of poverty in medical field?
sub_questions.f: What is Dr. Zakir Hussain's concept of education?
sub_questions.g: Which event does the expression 'the burning ghat' refer to?
sub_questions.h: What are the features of drama?
sub_questions.i: Name the areas where English is used as a second language.

anuprashna.a: कवि ने सम्मानित क्यों महसूस किया?
anuprashna.b: जंगलों में कैसी स्थितियाँ व्याप्त हैं?
anuprashna.c: शब्द के वास्तविक अर्थ में सभ्यता क्या है?
anuprashna.d: मार्टिन लूथर किंग, जूनियर किन 'परीक्षणों और कष्टों' के बारे में बात करते हैं?
anuprashna.e: चिकित्सा क्षेत्र में गरीबी का क्या प्रभाव है?
anuprashna.f: डॉ. जाकिर हुसैन की शिक्षा की अवधारणा क्या है?
anuprashna.g: अभिव्यक्ति 'द बर्निंग घाट' किस घटना को संदर्भित करती है?
anuprashna.i: उन क्षेत्रों के नाम बताइए जहाँ अंग्रेजी का प्रयोग दूसरी भाषा के रूप में किया जाता है।
anuprashna.j: किस वजह से अंग्रेजी में उधार (borrowings) आए?
